numdifftools.multicomplex.bicomplex¶

class numdifftools.multicomplex.bicomplex(z1, z2)[source][source]¶

Creates an instance of a bicomplex object. zeta = z1 + j*z2, where z1 and z2 are complex numbers.

__init__(z1, z2)[source][source]¶
